# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

The following versions of ClaudeOS are currently supported with security updates:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| master  | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a potential security vulnerability in this project, please report it privately.

Please do NOT open a public issue for security vulnerabilities.

Instead, please send an email to the maintainer or use the GitHub private vulnerability reporting feature if enabled.

**Maintainer:** @khaterdev

We appreciate your help in keeping this project secure!
